ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( join ` K ) = ( join ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( meet ` K ) = ( meet ` K ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_islat | |- ( K e. Lat <-> ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom ( join ` K ) = ( ( Base ` K ) X. ( Base ` K ) ) /\ dom ( meet ` K ) = ( ( Base ` K ) X. ( Base ` K ) ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simplbi | |- ( K e. Lat -> K e. Poset ) |
